title: Looking For Ranked 5's Team
body:
Im looking to Join a Ranked team, mained bot lane and jungle last season, but can play any role.
currently in B3 but im not having much fun getting all these feeders and afk'ers. 
Would like to be in a fun team that can play well but aren't toxic towards members and enemy teams.
Hit me up! IGN SgtPuffles

Also looking for Duo partner!
